items.sentence: Tom said he thought that Mary was good at speaking French.
Tom was in Boston last week, but I doubt he's still there.
Tom said that he wished that he could speak French better.
Tom said that he thought Mary was good at speaking French.
Tom and Mary both want to stay in Boston for another week.
I had a valid visa, so I was allowed to enter the country.
I had a bad headache yesterday. That was why I was absent.
I kept a diary in French when I was a high school student.
I thought that a cup of coffee might make you feel better.
I don't remember seeing the letter, but perhaps I read it.
